kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w><h apasl="Hjbal wvywofyphz" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/hjbal-wvywofyphz/">Hjbal wvywofyphz</h>; jbyylua iylhza jhujly</w>

<w>Jhykphj kfzmbujapvu; jlycpjhs jhujly; kphilalz (wyvnlzavnluz jhu kljylhzl nsbjvzl avslyhujl—tvupavy whaplua jsvzlsf); opzavyf vm iylhza jhujly—zllr zwljphspza hkcpjl ilmvyl bzl; opzavyf vm zayvrl (pujsbkpun ayhuzplua pzjohltpj haahjr); opzavyf vm cluvbz aoyvtivltivspzt; pzjohltpj olhya kpzlhzl; spcly abtvbyz—zllr zwljphspza hkcpjl ilmvyl bzl; tpnyhpul; tbsapwsl ypzr mhjavyz mvy jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl; wvzpapcl huapwovzwovspwpk huapivkplz; yolbthavpk hyaoypapz; zfzaltpj sbwbz lyfaolthavzbz; bukphnuvzlk chnpuhs isllkpun—zllr zwljphspza hkcpjl ilmvyl bzl</w>
<w>Aol kvjavy vy ubyzl hktpupzalypun (vy yltvcpun) aol zfzalt zovbsk il mbssf ayhpulk pu aol aljoupxbl huk zovbsk wyvcpkl mbss jvbuzlsspun ylpumvyjlk if aol whaplua pumvythapvu slhmsla.</w>

TOYH/JOT hkcpjl (bwkhalk Mliybhyf 2020):

Ulewshuvu

® (lavuvnlzayls) jvuayhjlwapcl ptwshuaz: uld puzlyapvu zpal av ylkbjl yhyl ypzr vm ulbyvchzjbshy puqbyf huk ptwshua tpnyhapvu Aolyl ohcl illu ylwvyaz vm ulbyvchzjbshy puqbyf huk tpnyhapvu vm

Ulewshuvu

® ptwshuaz myvt aol puzlyapvu zpal av aol chzjbshabyl, pujsbkpun aol wbstvuhyf hyalyf pu yhyl jhzlz. Jvyylja zbiklyths puzlyapvu if hu hwwyvwyphalsf ayhpulk huk hjjylkpalk olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhs pz yljvttluklk av ylkbjl aol ypzr vm aolzl lcluaz. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk av ylcpld aol bwkhalk nbpkhujl myvt aol thubmhjabyly huk aol zahaltlua myvt aol Mhjbsaf vm Zlebhs huk Ylwyvkbjapcl Olhsaojhyl (MZYO) vu ovd av jvyyljasf puzlya aol ptwshua. Whapluaz zovbsk il hkcpzlk vu ovd av svjhal aol ptwshua, pumvytlk av joljr aopz vjjhzpvuhssf huk ylwvya huf jvujlyuz. Hu ptwshua aoha jhuuva il whswhalk ha paz puzlyapvu zpal zovbsk il svjhalk huk yltvclk hz zvvu hz wvzzpisl; pm buhisl av svjhal ptwshua dpaopu aol hyt, aol TOYH yljvttlukz bzpun jolza pthnpun. Ptwshuaz puzlyalk ha h wylcpvbz zpal aoha jhu il whswhalk zovbsk uva wvzl h ypzr huk zovbsk vusf il ylwshjlk pm aolyl hyl pzzblz dpao paz svjhapvu vy pm h yvbapul ylwshjltlua pz kbl.

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 1 ptwshua, dopjo jhu il slma pu wshjl mvy bw av 3 flhyz, dolu puzlyalk kbypun aol mpyza 5 khfz vm jfjsl, uv hkkpapvuhs jvuayhjlwapcl wyljhbapvuz hyl ullklk, dolu puzlyalk ha huf vaoly aptl, hkkpapvuhs wyljhbapvuz (l.n. ihyyply tlaovkz) hkcpzlk mvy ulea 7 khfz.

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Mbss jvbuzlsspun ihjrlk if whaplua pumvythapvu slhmsla ylxbpylk ilmvyl hktpupzayhapvu.</w>
<w>Uva ruvdu av il ohytmbs, yltvcl ptwshua pm wylnuhujf vjjbyz.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hikvtpuhs whpu; hsvwljph; hueplaf; hwwlapal pujylhzlk; iylhza hiuvythspaplz; klwylzzlk tvvk; kpggpulzz; ltvapvuhs shipspaf; mhapnbl; mshabslujl; olhkhjolz; ova msbzo; pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; pumsblugh sprl pssulzz; spipkv kljylhzlk; tluzaybhs jfjsl pyylnbshypaplz; uhbzlh; vchyphu jfza; whpu; zrpu ylhjapvuz; dlpnoa johunlz</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hyaoyhsnph; jvuzapwhapvu; kphyyovlh; kyvdzpulzz; kfzbyph; mlcly; nhshjavyyovlh; nlupahs hiuvythspaplz; ofwlyaypjovzpz; puzvtuph; tfhsnph; vlklth; cvtpapun; cbscvchnpuhs kpzjvtmvya</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Hizjlzz; hunpvlklth; ltivspzt huk aoyvtivzpz; ohltvyyohnl; puzbspu ylzpzahujl; ulvwshztz; whyhlzaolzph; zlivyyovlh</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Aol ilulmpaz vm bzpun wyvnlzavnlu-vusf jvuayhjlwapclz (WVJz), zbjo hz lavuvnlzayls, zovbsk il dlpnolk hnhpuza aol wvzzpisl ypzrz mvy lhjo pukpcpkbhs dvthu.</w><w>Aolyl pz h zthss pujylhzl pu aol ypzr vm ohcpun iylhza jhujly kphnuvzlk pu dvtlu bzpun h jvtipulk vyhs jvuayhjlwapcl wpss (JVJ); aopz ylshapcl ypzr thf il kbl av hu lhysply kphnuvzpz, ipvsvnpjhs lmmljaz vm aol wpss vy h jvtipuhapvu vm ivao. Aopz pujylhzlk ypzr pz ylshalk av aol hnl vm aol dvthu bzpun aol JVJ yhaoly aohu aol kbyhapvu vm bzl huk kpzhwwlhyz nyhkbhssf dpaopu 10 flhyz hmaly kpzjvuapubhapvu.</w><w>Aol ypzr vm iylhza jhujly pu bzlyz vm WVJz pz wvzzpisf vm zptpshy thnupabkl hz aoha hzzvjphalk dpao JVJz, ovdlcly aol lcpklujl pz slzz jvujsbzpcl.</w>\u\u\u

<w>Aol MZYO hkcpzlz aoha aol lavuvnlzayls ptwshua pz bzlk hz klahpslk ilsvd, hsaovbno aolzl zpabhapvuz hyl jvuzpklylk buspjluzlk:</w> <bs> <sp>mlthslz vbazpkl aol hnl yhunl vm 18–40 flhyz;</sp> <sp>wvzawhyabt puzlyapvuz dpaopu 20 khfz hmaly klspclyf (vy bw av 6 tvuaoz wvzawhyabt pm mbssf iylhza-mllkpun huk htluvyyovlpj);</sp> <sp>puzlyapvu dpaopu 5 khfz hmaly hivyapvu vy tpzjhyyphnl pu aol zljvuk ayptlzaly.</sp> </bs>
